name: symbols_suggested
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool seeking_alpha_finance.
Tool description: Seeking Alpha is the world’s largest investing community. Seeking Alpha’s content has unparalleled breadth and depth: from stocks, ETFs and mutual funds to commodities and cryptocurrency.   **Support**:  [tipsters@rapi.one](mailto:tipsters@rapi.one) / t.me/api_tipsters
API description: Fetch suggested tickers based on a given ticker slug.

ticker_slug.description: The ticker slug to base the suggestions on.
